text:
P. Tamilselvan (38) of Jamin Elampillai in Jedarpalayam has surrendered before the Village Administrative Officer Murugesan after killing his 11-month-old son. His wife Revathi (27) had committed suicide on December 21, 2015. Tamilselvan was arrested for abetting her suicide. The couple’s two children were under the care of Tamilselvan’s sister.

On March 15, Tamilselvan was out on bail and took the son to his house. When Tamilselvan’s sister’s husband Baskaran visited his house, he could not find the child. Tamilselvan told him that he left the child in a temple. Baskaran informed Childline 1098. During an inquiry, Tamilselvan admitted that he killed the child.

On Wednesday the body of the child was exhumed from a farm land.
title: Man kills infant
